TABLE.NAME: assignfeedback_points
TABLE.COMMENT: incremental points awarded for offline activity

FIELD.NAME: assignid
FIELD.COMMENT: the id of the assign record these points relate to

FIELD.NAME: gradeid
FIELD.COMMENT: the id of the assign_grades record these points relate to

FIELD.NAME: awardby
FIELD.COMMENT: the id of the user by whom these points were awarded

FIELD.NAME: awardto
FIELD.COMMENT: the id of the user to whom these points were awarded

FIELD.NAME: points
FIELD.COMMENT: the number of points awarded

FIELD.NAME: latitude
FIELD.COMMENT: the latitude of where the points were awarded

FIELD.NAME: longitude
FIELD.COMMENT: the longitude of where the points were awarded

FIELD.NAME: commenttext
FIELD.COMMENT: a comment relating to these points

FIELD.NAME: commentformat
FIELD.COMMENT: the format of the commenttext field

FIELD.NAME: timecreated
FIELD.COMMENT: the time this record was created

FIELD.NAME: timeawarded
FIELD.COMMENT: the time this record was created

FIELD.NAME: timemodified
FIELD.COMMENT: the time this record last modified

KEY.NAME: primary
KEY.COMMENT: the unique id for this points

KEY.NAME: assipoin_ass_fk
KEY.COMMENT: the id of the assign record these points relate to

KEY.NAME: assipoin_gra_fk
KEY.COMMENT: the id of the assign_grades record these points relate to

KEY.NAME: assipoin_aby_fk
KEY.COMMENT: the id of the user by whom these points were awarded

KEY.NAME: assipoin_ato_fk
KEY.COMMENT: the id of the user to whom these points were awarded

TABLE.NAME: assignfeedback_points_maps
TABLE.COMMENT: user-maps used in points feedback for assignments

FIELD.NAME: name
FIELD.COMMENT: the name of this user-map

FIELD.NAME: userid
FIELD.COMMENT: the id of the teacher user record that this user-map relates to

FIELD.NAME: groupid
FIELD.COMMENT: the id of the group record, if any, that this user-map relates to

FIELD.NAME: assignid
FIELD.COMMENT: the id of the assign record that this user-map relates to

FIELD.NAME: context
FIELD.COMMENT: the context level of this user-map

FIELD.NAME: mapwidth
FIELD.COMMENT: the width (in pixels) of this user-map

FIELD.NAME: mapheight
FIELD.COMMENT: the height (in pixels) of this user-map

FIELD.NAME: userwidth
FIELD.COMMENT: the width (in pixels) of a user-tile in this user-map

FIELD.NAME: userheight
FIELD.COMMENT: the height (in pixels) of a user-tile in this user-map

FIELD.NAME: privacy
FIELD.COMMENT: 0=private, 1==public

KEY.NAME: primary
KEY.COMMENT: the unique id for this user-map

KEY.NAME: assipoinmaps_use_fk
KEY.COMMENT: the id of the teacher user record that this user-map relates to

KEY.NAME: assipoinmaps_gro_fk
KEY.COMMENT: the id of the group record that this user-map relates to

KEY.NAME: assipoinmaps_ass_fk
KEY.COMMENT: the id of the assign record that this user-map relates to

TABLE.NAME: assignfeedback_points_coords
TABLE.COMMENT: (y,x) CSS coordinates of users in maps for points feedback for assignments

FIELD.NAME: mapid
FIELD.COMMENT: the id of the user-map record that these coordinates relate to

FIELD.NAME: userid
FIELD.COMMENT: the id of the student user record that these coordinates relate to

FIELD.NAME: x
FIELD.COMMENT: the x value for these CSS coordinates

FIELD.NAME: y
FIELD.COMMENT: the y value for these CSS coordinates

KEY.NAME: primary
KEY.COMMENT: the unique id for this user-map

KEY.NAME: assipoincoor_map_fk
KEY.COMMENT: the id of the user-map record that these coordinates relate to

KEY.NAME: assipoincoor_use_fk
KEY.COMMENT: the id of the student user record that these coordinates relate to
